0: Ask the bar to make you a Doubletree Martini which is a mixture of vodka butterscotch liquer and baileys
Then i went down to breakfast and was asked if I wanted the buffet or to order off a menu and I said the buffet was fine
Terrible bar service they only served the center of the bar and ignored the sides
it will be nice to have a bar fridge and a safe in the room
The restaurant is also undergoing a facelift so was displaced in another area
I was disappointed to find that the entire lobby area snack area and fitness room were unavailable for use due to construction
There are a few restaurants but I did not see very many fast food or chain restaurants
You have to sit in the dining area
Only cleanliness suggestion clean back from of shower bars soap scum evident
Had a nice bar and pools but the rooms were very small and not very nice
1: Lots of drink and food specials at the bar
Went here for an FCLA conference asked for ice water at bar and got it quickly staff was nice ballroom had a nice atmosphere elevator was slow
We sat out on the newly renovated tavern by the pool and enjoyed a competitive game of UNO while casually having dinner in our swimsuits
Renovated lobby bar and restaurant look fantastic
Very friendly staff restaurant was very good and the hotel was updated and very clean
Breakfast buffet was pretty decent and had lots to choose from
Every hotel we ’ve stayed at have Complementary breakfast
Service is great and so was the breakfast but the hotel is not up to the double tree standard in my opinion
The wine from the small but ample bar was delicious as was the breakfastWil definitely plan to stay here again
Arrived later evening front desk and restaurant staff were very accommodating
